name: wtd-pions
description: Красивый одностраничный сайт-приглашение в стиле романтичного минимализма с акварельным оформлением для Евгения и Александры.

scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p public/assets/webfonts && curl -o public/assets/all.min.css https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css && curl -o public/assets/webfonts/fa-solid-900.woff2 https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/webfonts/fa-solid-900.woff2 && curl -o public/assets/webfonts/fa-regular-400.woff2 https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/webfonts/fa-regular-400.woff2 && curl -o public/assets/webfonts/fa-brands-400.woff2 https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/webfonts/fa-brands-400.woff2 && curl -o public/assets/webfonts/fa-v4compatibility.woff2 https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/webfonts/fa-v4compatibility.woff2
